title: Luvo Manyonga: From drug addiction to world champion
description:
South African athlete Luvo Manyonga specialises in long jump. He's an Olympic silver medallist and a world champion. But an addiction to methamphetamine meant his life on and off the field came close to irreversible ruin.

LINKS:
